channel.title: s3 on A Journey in Automating the Datacenter
channel.description: Recent content in s3 on A Journey in Automating the Datacenter

item.title: Automating Testing & Deployment of your Website
item.description: As websites go, mine is definitely in its infancy. This past week, I brought my website online by following a couple blog posts of some fellow colleagues (Thom Greene & Mike Tabor). The help they provided was invaluable as I was able to register a domain and get a website going in a short period of time. After following their instructions, I immediately knew what I wanted to do to add to their instructions….
